Reviews.Title: Too early to tell, but..
Reviews.Author: Black Box
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my NEX 7, worked out of the box, charged ok, camera was able to read level of charge. Haven't used them alot yet, so can't tell if they'll last as long as the original. But on the surface, it looks like it was a great value buy as backup batteries. Very little downside I would think, so I would cautiously recommend this as worthwhile buy if you're looking for alternatives to the overpriced originals.

Reviews.Title: cheap but they actually work in my nex7
Reviews.Author: Gregfl "Gregfl"
Reviews.Content: They are much lighter than the stock battery of my nex7, but they charge right up and work. Great for a back up battery.

Reviews.Title: Sony Nex7 replacement batteries
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I purchased the two pack of this advertised battery, and have not tested its ability in the NEX-7. I rated this item two stars because the image that the seller uses on Amazon does not reflect what I recieved. I own two Sony OEM batteries, and those batteries resemble those used in the sellers image. The replacement batteries are lighter in weight than the Sony batteries, as mentioned in a previous review.

Reviews.Title: Sony Nex5N replacement batteries
Reviews.Author: jan "rock 4 ever"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 2 pack of batteries as back-ups for my Sony Nex-5N.  The first one charged just fine and lasted as long as the original. I gave it to my friend with a Nex at a concert and told her to keep it.  The second one would not charge -- it was just dead.  I messaged Amazon and the seller sent a new battery within 2 weeks.  The new one is just fine and I alternate the two.  The Nex is very easy on batteries unless you use a lot of flash (which I normally do not).  I take a lot of photos and videos at concerts and usually one battery lasts at least for the evening -- last concert was 300 pics and 4 vids.  I have only had this battery for 2 months, so I cannot comment on its longevity. This battery fits perfectly and looks exactly like the one that came with the camera!  I think it is an amazing value for the price!!!  Almost choked when I saw the Sony price of $69.00!!!

Reviews.Title: good buy and great price
Reviews.Author: Rock Beaver
Reviews.Content: It works well, esp. for the price (I paid about $8 a piece). I seems to discharge itself in NEX-7. So I took it out when storing the camera.

Reviews.Title: Work great!
Reviews.Author: Judgebeekeeper
Reviews.Content: These batteries are much less expensive than Sony brand, so I bought 2 as back-up for my Nex-7. They hold perhaps 2/3 the charge of the Sony, but that is of little importance because they still allow hundreds of photos and are perfect as back-ups.

Reviews.Title: Sony Nex5N replacement batteries.
Reviews.Author: AlexF
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 2 pack of batteries as back-ups for my Sony Nex-5N. The first one charged just fine and lasted as long as the original.But second one looks like never seem to be fully charged even after I just took them off the charger.

Reviews.Title: Trouble holding charge
Reviews.Author: linji
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy having replacement batteries and for the most part these work just fine. However, they never seem to be fully charged even after I just took them off the charger.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for, but do what?
Reviews.Author: Stephen H. Schwartz
Reviews.Content: Sony sells 1 battery for about 50 bucks. These batteries sell for 2 for 20 bucks. No, they don't hold a charge for as long as the Sony brand, maybe only 80 percent, but that still adds up to 160 percent of a Sony charge for 40 percent of the cost. Buy these batteries. It's a no brainer.
